ygData.subject: Bone Chips issues
ygData.msgSnippet: 1. ALL pets spells past 1st lvl use 2 bone chips, never more, never less. 2 Warbone Chips- CAN NOT BE USED TO SUMMON PETS! CAN NOT BE USED TO SUMMON PETS! CAN
ygData.messageBody:
1. ALL pets spells past 1st lvl use 2 bone chips,
never more, never less.

2 Warbone Chips- CAN NOT BE USED TO SUMMON PETS!
CAN NOT BE USED TO SUMMON PETS!
CAN NOT BE USED TO SUMMON PETS!

Every so often, this comes up. TRUST ME, try
this, put ALL your bone chips in the bank, and try to
summon a pet with only warbone chips, or with 1 bone
chip and 1 warbone. YOU WILL FAIL! I tried this at
around 16th lvl, and it NEVER worked. Warbone chips
are for shaman alachamy.

Gaeorn Kinslayer
50th lvl Human Lich
Bristlebane
